title: Looking for Studio font
content: I client of mine has her heart set on this font for her wedding invitations. It came with her version of Microsoft word. I do not have it. Does anyone know where I could get it at no cost?
author: shartke

comments.content:
never heard of it. do you have an example?

dr

here's a link to a sample of the font  
 [http://www.fonts.com/findfonts/detail.htm?pid=420389&grab\_id=0&page\_id=2...](http://web.archive.org/web/20131109011917/http:/www.fonts.com/findfonts/detail.htm?pid=420389&grab_id=0&page_id=23552&query=studio&SCOPE=Fonts "http://www.fonts.com/findfonts/detail.htm?pid=420389&grab\_id=0&page\_id=23552&query=studio&SCOPE=Fonts")
It looks like this font is no longer available at no cost if you are finding it on Fonts.com
That font has never shipped with Word. Must have come from elsewhere.
AKA STUNNING but originally produced by Lettergeiterij Amsterdam
